column1: To celebrate each gathering of fruits
column2: Manwë made a high feast in praise of Ilúvatar. For this feast
column3: the Valar and Maiar were bidden to come to the Ilmarin. Just before the Darkening of Valinor
column4: a feast was held to which also the Vanyar and Noldor came
column5: and they sang together with the Maiar before Manwë and Varda.
